metadata.title: CVE-2021-45104 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HTCondor 9.0.x before 9.0.10 and 9.1.x before9.5.1. An attacker who can capture HTCondor network data can interfere withusers' jobs and data.

criterions.comment: condor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
